channel.title: BAttlefield2 Doesn't work on my two labtops
channel.description: Okay both of my labtops are Dual core and have 1.5 GB +. And one of them is a g2 Asus computer. Another one is the Acer Aspire 9410. So I am using cracked versions but normal client with mini image but then Everything I start teh game it goes to black screen for like 3 seconds and goes back to desktop with no error or it says Bf2 has stopped working ^^

item.title: BAttlefield2 Doesn't work on my two labtops
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

It’s your graphics card, buy a new laptop. I would know, this used to happen to me on my old PC with Battlefield 2.

Read full topic

item.title: BAttlefield2 Doesn't work on my two labtops

item.description:
@The_Solid wrote:

Nah no harm done I also spell laptop wrong for some reason. The way my fingers move xD> But anyways I do have vista on my two laptops but so does my other two desktops.

@FastBawlz Yes we are brothers[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2007, 12:59:58 PM[/size][hr]anyone?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 24, 2007, 10:28:50 PM[/size][hr]anyone please?

item.title: BAttlefield2 Doesn't work on my two labtops
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

Solid,No such thing as Labtops unless your a “On the go Scientist”
I hate people who say Labtops,I used to say it when i was 10.
Not trying to flame,Just telling you there’s no such thing as a “labtop”
It’s laptop.
Anyways,Do you have vista?
Because Vista on my Step-dads comp,it won’t let you play some games.

Read full topic
